name: Tender Love and Care: A Leorio Dating Sim!
name_original: Tender Love and Care: A Leorio Dating Sim!
description:
Have you ever wanted to date Leorio Paladiknight from Hunter x Hunter? Of course you have! We’ve all been there. Now you can live out your dreams in this Leorio-centric, Kurapika POV dating sim! 

Made by Tumblr users @leopika-rights and @ratbastardging over the course of 6 days, against all odds.
